## Feature Task list ## 
**Only Assignes can edit this list.**  
**Assignes: Make sure you comment on steps you tick off.**  

- [ ] Is the feature request clear and concise?
- [ ] Is the feature conceptually good and approved for implementation?
- [ ] When is the feature scheduled? : 
- [ ] Has the feature been implemented?
- [ ] Is the feature bug-free and ready to be put into the live game?
